Method.name: populateTestForms
Method.Implementation: #dim sc,sc1,sc2 AS %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Test.Company).Populate(count, verbose, , , $$$NO) set sc1 = ##class(Form.Test.Person).Populate(count, verbose, , , $$$NO) set sc2 = ##class(Form.Test.Simple).Populate(count, verbose, , , $$$NO) set sc = $$$ADDSC(sc, $$$ADDSC(sc1, sc2)) return sc

Method.name: deleteTestForms
Method.Implementation: #dim sc AS %Status = $$$OK set sc = ##class(Form.Test.Person).%DeleteExtent() set sc1 = ##class(Form.Test.Company).%DeleteExtent() set sc2 = ##class(Form.Test.Simple).%DeleteExtent() set sc = $$$ADDSC(sc, $$$ADDSC(sc1, sc2)) return sc
